bug.author: szha
bug.summary: bug in word language model example
bug.description:
The arguments of RNN don't align <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/blob/master/example/gluon/word_language_model/model.py#L33>https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/blob/master/example/gluon/word_language_model/model.py#L33</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/szha>@szha</denchmark-link> What is the issue here? I don't see misalignment in the arguments now. Please clarify. Thanks!
